entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -40.4°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
